name: Compliance Dashboard Module Access
description: Back Office Users can navigate to the Compliance Dashboard to view companies list and manage compliance-related activities

background.text: I am on the application at https://test.com
I am logged in as a Back Office User

scenarios.name: Back Office User successfully accesses Compliance Dashboard module

steps.text: I am on the home page
I look for the Compliance Dashboard module
I should see the Compliance Dashboard module is visible
I should see the module displays "Compliance Dashboard" title

scenarios.name: Back Office User successfully navigates to Compliance Dashboard companies list

steps.text: I am on the home page
the Compliance Dashboard module is visible
I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
I should be navigated to the Compliance Dashboard
I should see the companies list view

scenarios.name: Companies list view displays all company records

steps.text: I have navigated to the Compliance Dashboard
I view the companies list
I should see records of all the companies
the companies list should contain company data

scenarios.name: Compliance Dashboard module title is correctly displayed

steps.text: I am on the home page as a Back Office User
I locate the Compliance Dashboard module
the module should display exactly "Compliance Dashboard" as the title
the title should be clearly visible and readable

scenarios.name: Multiple clicks on Compliance Dashboard module work consistently

steps.text: I am on the home page
I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
I should navigate to the companies list view
I return to the home page
I click on the Compliance Dashboard module again
I should successfully navigate to the companies list view again

scenarios.name: Companies list view loads with proper data structure

steps.text: I have clicked on the Compliance Dashboard module
the companies list view loads
I should see a properly structured list of companies
each company record should display relevant information
the list should be organized and readable

scenarios.name: Non-Back Office User cannot see Compliance Dashboard module

steps.text: I am logged in as a non-Back Office User
I am on the home page
I should not see the Compliance Dashboard module
the module should not be accessible to my user role

scenarios.name: Compliance Dashboard module is not accessible when user is not logged in

steps.text: I am on the application
I am not logged in
I try to access the home page
I should not see the Compliance Dashboard module
I should be prompted to log in

scenarios.name: Error handling when companies list fails to load

steps.text: I have clicked on the Compliance Dashboard module
there is an error loading the companies list
I should see an appropriate error message
I should have options to retry or return to the previous page

scenarios.name: Navigation fails when Compliance Dashboard module is unavailable

steps.text: I am on the home page
the Compliance Dashboard module is temporarily unavailable
I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
I should see an error message indicating the service is unavailable
I should remain on the current page

scenarios.name: Empty companies list displays appropriate message

steps.text: I have navigated to the Compliance Dashboard
there are no companies in the system
I should see a message indicating no companies are available
the companies list view should display an empty state

scenarios.name: Large number of companies displays with proper pagination or scrolling

steps.text: there are a very large number of companies in the system
I navigate to the Compliance Dashboard companies list
the list should load efficiently
I should see pagination controls or infinite scrolling
the page should remain responsive

scenarios.name: Single company record displays correctly in the list

steps.text: there is exactly one company in the system
I navigate to the Compliance Dashboard companies list
I should see the single company record displayed
the list view should handle the single record appropriately

scenarios.name: Alternative navigation path to Compliance Dashboard through direct URL

steps.text: I am logged in as a Back Office User
I navigate directly to the Compliance Dashboard URL
I should successfully access the companies list view
the page should display all company records

gherkin_content:
Feature: Compliance Dashboard Module Access
  Back Office Users can navigate to the Compliance Dashboard to view companies list and manage compliance-related activities

  Background:
    Given I am on the application at https://test.com
    And I am logged in as a Back Office User

  @smoke @positive
  Scenario: Back Office User successfully accesses Compliance Dashboard module
    Given I am on the home page
    When I look for the Compliance Dashboard module
    Then I should see the Compliance Dashboard module is visible
    And I should see the module displays "Compliance Dashboard" title

  @smoke @positive
  Scenario: Back Office User successfully navigates to Compliance Dashboard companies list
    Given I am on the home page
    And the Compliance Dashboard module is visible
    When I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
    Then I should be navigated to the Compliance Dashboard
    And I should see the companies list view

  @positive @data
  Scenario: Companies list view displays all company records
    Given I have navigated to the Compliance Dashboard
    When I view the companies list
    Then I should see records of all the companies
    And the companies list should contain company data

  @positive @ui
  Scenario: Compliance Dashboard module title is correctly displayed
    Given I am on the home page as a Back Office User
    When I locate the Compliance Dashboard module
    Then the module should display exactly "Compliance Dashboard" as the title
    And the title should be clearly visible and readable

  @positive @usability
  Scenario: Multiple clicks on Compliance Dashboard module work consistently
    Given I am on the home page
    When I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
    Then I should navigate to the companies list view
    When I return to the home page
    And I click on the Compliance Dashboard module again
    Then I should successfully navigate to the companies list view again

  @positive @data
  Scenario: Companies list view loads with proper data structure
    Given I have clicked on the Compliance Dashboard module
    When the companies list view loads
    Then I should see a properly structured list of companies
    And each company record should display relevant information
    And the list should be organized and readable

  @negative @security
  Scenario: Non-Back Office User cannot see Compliance Dashboard module
    Given I am logged in as a non-Back Office User
    When I am on the home page
    Then I should not see the Compliance Dashboard module
    And the module should not be accessible to my user role

  @negative @security
  Scenario: Compliance Dashboard module is not accessible when user is not logged in
    Given I am on the application
    But I am not logged in
    When I try to access the home page
    Then I should not see the Compliance Dashboard module
    And I should be prompted to log in

  @negative @error
  Scenario: Error handling when companies list fails to load
    Given I have clicked on the Compliance Dashboard module
    When there is an error loading the companies list
    Then I should see an appropriate error message
    And I should have options to retry or return to the previous page

  @negative @error
  Scenario: Navigation fails when Compliance Dashboard module is unavailable
    Given I am on the home page
    When the Compliance Dashboard module is temporarily unavailable
    And I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
    Then I should see an error message indicating the service is unavailable
    And I should remain on the current page

  @edge-case @data
  Scenario: Empty companies list displays appropriate message
    Given I have navigated to the Compliance Dashboard
    When there are no companies in the system
    Then I should see a message indicating no companies are available
    And the companies list view should display an empty state

  @edge-case @performance
  Scenario: Large number of companies displays with proper pagination or scrolling
    Given there are a very large number of companies in the system
    When I navigate to the Compliance Dashboard companies list
    Then the list should load efficiently
    And I should see pagination controls or infinite scrolling
    And the page should remain responsive

  @edge-case @boundary
  Scenario: Single company record displays correctly in the list
    Given there is exactly one company in the system
    When I navigate to the Compliance Dashboard companies list
    Then I should see the single company record displayed
    And the list view should handle the single record appropriately

  @alternative @navigation
  Scenario: Alternative navigation path to Compliance Dashboard through direct URL
    Given I am logged in as a Back Office User
    When I navigate directly to the Compliance Dashboard URL
    Then I should successfully access the companies list view
    And the page should display all company records
